title: (x) strict geometric CMPBS logo - custom designed {Miguel}
content:
It’s kinda ugly but i’m curious…

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cmpbs.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=cmpbs.jpg) | 3.57 KB |
author: wilson

comments.content:
I think it might be a mixture of [House Chalet Paris 1970](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219064158/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts) and a [Eurostile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20051219064158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/extended-2/) s with the m adapted\* to make it monospace.  
\*squooshed  
Tim

I think they just used the grid and a compass (or and up-to-date technology, AKA Illustrator).  
Therefore I would say, handlettered.
